required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Comparison of Pharmacokinetics and Safety of Recombinant Anti IgE Humanized Monoclonal Antibody for Injection(HS632) and Omalizumab With a Single Injection (Xolair®)
clinical_study.official_title: A Multicenter, Randomized, Double-blind, Parallel Controlled Phase I Clinical Trial Comparing the Pharmacokinetic and Safety Similarities of Recombinant Anti IgE Humanized Monoclonal Antibody for Injection (HS632) With Omalizumab (Xolair® ) After a Single Dose Administration in Chinese Healthy Subjects

lead_sponsor.agency: Zhe Jiang Hisun Bioray Bio-pharmaceu tical Co.Ltd

clinical_study.source: Zhe Jiang Hisun Bioray Bio-pharmaceu tical Co.Ltd

brief_summary.textblock: To evaluate the bioequivalence of HS632 and Omalizumab (Xolair®) in a single subcutaneous administration in healthy subjects.

primary_outcome.measure: Bioequivalence of HS632 and Xolair® in single subcutaneous administration in healthy subjects
primary_outcome.description: Bioequivalence of HS632 and Xolair® in single subcutaneous administration in healthy subjects

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the plasma concentration versus time curve (AUC) (0 - t) of HS632 and Xolair® in single subcutaneous administration in healthy subjects
secondary_outcome.description: The area under the plasma concentration versus time curve (AUC) from 0 to the last selected time point, i.e. 2184h after the injection

secondary_outcome.measure: Peak plasma concentration (Cmax) of single subcutaneous administration of HS632 and Xolair® in healthy subjects
secondary_outcome.description: Peak plasma concentration (Cmax) after single subcutaneous administration of HS632 and Xolair® in healthy subjects

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the plasma concentration versus time curve (AUC) (0 -∞) of single subcutaneous administration of HS632 and Xolair® in healthy subjects
secondary_outcome.description: Area under the plasma concentration versus time curve (AUC) (0 -∞) of single subcutaneous administration of HS632 and Xolair® in healthy subjects

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to reach peak plasma concentration (Tmax) of single subcutaneous administration of HS632 and Xolair® in healthy subjects
secondary_outcome.description: Time to reach peak plasma concentration (Tmax) of single subcutaneous administration of HS632 and Xolair® in healthy subjects

secondary_outcome.measure: Total clearance corrected by bioavailability (CLt/F) of single subcutaneous administration of HS632 and Xolair® in healthy subjects
secondary_outcome.description: Total clearance corrected by bioavailability (CLt/F) of single subcutaneous administration of HS632 and Xolair® in healthy subjects

secondary_outcome.measure: Half-life (T1/2) of single subcutaneous administration of HS632 and Xolair® in healthy subjects
secondary_outcome.description: Half-life (T1/2) of single subcutaneous administration of HS632 and Xolair® in healthy subjects

secondary_outcome.measure: Apparent volume of distribution corrected by bioavailability (Vd/F) of single subcutaneous administration of HS632 and Xolair® in healthy subjects
secondary_outcome.description: Apparent volume of distribution corrected by bioavailability (Vd/F) of single subcutaneous administration of HS632 and Xolair® in healthy subject

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of participants with treatment emergent adverse event (TEAE)
secondary_outcome.description: percentage of participants with treatment emergent adverse event (TEAE)

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of of the participants with anti-drug antibody( ADA) of single subcutaneous administration of HS632 and Xolair® in healthy subjects
secondary_outcome.description: percentage of of the participants with anti-drug antibody( ADA) of single subcutaneous administration of HS632 and Xolair® in healthy subjects

facility.name: Huashan Hospital Affiliated to Fudan University
